author: Mike Angelo
title: Loopwell: The Space for Well-being
coverAlt: Loopwell meditation room interior showing serene design and calming atmosphere
projectObjective: The founders of Loopwell wanted to renovate a building in Montclair, NJ and create a holistic well-being space and brand that operates as a wellness ecosystem in addition to a production and event venue.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Brand Video
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Loopwell brand video teaser showcasing wellness spaces and community events
mainKeypointMedia.description: Main promotional video highlighting Loopwell's holistic well-being ecosystem featuring meditation areas and community gathering spaces

mainKeypointDescription: I worked with the founders and a team to develop an impactful brand, a powerful website with an event and e-commerce system, and various marketing materials. By partnering with thought leaders, instructors, and organizations in the wellness industry, we successfully cultivated a following and membership and hosted countless seminars, luxury events, and high-quality productions.

projectKeypoints.title: Breaking Ground on the Brand
projectKeypoints.description: While the building was being renovated, we iterated through a ton of sketches and ideas trying to find the right branding to represent Loopwell's mission. We ultimately landed on an organic look inspired by nature and our connection to it as humans.

media.altText: Various naturalistic and organic Loopwell logo concepts

Quote wall for Loopwell that says 'All are welcome here. At loop, we work and live responsibly, mindfully and with purpose. To better our companies, communities, families, and ourselves. To be good humans and a force for good in the world.'
Loopwell branding on the large screen in the main space surrounded by plants and large windows
Apothecary area at Loopwell with various plant decor and holistic products
Loopwell slogan 'loop with us' on an organic fern backdrop

projectKeypoints.title: Building a Powerful Site
projectKeypoints.description: In order to handle multiple weekly events and space reservations, Loopwell needed an intuitive website that managed events, attendees, memberships, and payments. I helped design and develop the website and implemented custom design integrations and scripts based on their needs.

media.altText: Video demonstration of Loopwell website event calendar
Example of an event registration modal on the Loopwell website
Video demonstration of the Loopwell website in a mobile window
Loopwell wellness wheel custom script
Video demonstration of Loopwell website capabilities

projectKeypoints.title: A/V Production and Event Ecosystem
projectKeypoints.description: To supplement our ecosystem with content, I worked with different teams to film events, set up live streaming and other live production necessities, and produce edits and marketing materials that could be used as promotion for both the event coordinators as well as the Loopwell brand.

media.altText: Corporate wellness event production highlights with professional lighting and setup
Sofistafunk music event live stream recording with multi-camera production
Yoga class hosted at Loopwell
Volvo partnership event showing luxury vehicle display and wellness integration
Cooking class hosted at Loopwell

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: Volvo
projectVideos.altText: Partnership with Volvo to promote their new lineup of EV models at Loopwell
projectVideos.description: We hosted Volvo to showcase their new lineup of electric vehicle models.

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: Montclair Film Festival
projectVideos.altText: Montclair Film Festival collaboration video at Loopwell venue
projectVideos.description: We hosted the annual Montclair Film Festival for cocktail hours, networking events, and screenings.

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: HerMD
projectVideos.altText: HerMD women's health workshop event at Loopwell wellness center
projectVideos.description: Women's health and wellness workshop production video

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: YPO
projectVideos.altText: Young Presidents Organization corporate wellness event video
projectVideos.description: Executive wellness retreat and networking event production

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: Wim Hof
projectVideos.altText: Wim Hof method workshop and breathing exercises demonstration video
projectVideos.description: Cold therapy and breathing workshop event recording

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: Water.org
projectVideos.altText: Water.org charity wellness event and fundraising video
projectVideos.description: Nonprofit partnership event for clean water initiative

projectVideos.title: Loopwell: Hope for the Flowers - Trina Paulus
projectVideos.altText: Hope for the Flowers author event with Trina Paulus at Loopwell
projectVideos.description: Literary event and book signing with author Trina Paulus

author: Mike Angelo
title: Drone Drop Pop-up
coverAlt: Drone delivering Bahlsen leibniz package to a surprised person on city street during marketing event
projectObjective: In order to promote their new brand identity and flagship product lineup, Bahlsen wanted a cutting-edge marketing campaign that would generate regional buzz and increase in-store and online sales.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Drone Drop Pop-up
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Bahlsen drone drop marketing campaign video showing drone deliveries and surprised reactions
mainKeypointMedia.description: Innovative drone delivery marketing campaign featuring surprise cookie drops to pedestrians in Montclair

mainKeypointDescription: We took over a popular shopping district in Montclair, NJ and filmed a fleet of drones delivering boxes of Bahlsen's products to unsuspecting people walking by. We captured the excitement on social media and supplemented the event with rich media digital marketing to drive both in-store and online sales.

projectKeypoints.title: An Event to Remember
projectKeypoints.description: I worked with a team on numerous different pre-production tasks. We hired drone operators, sketched a rough storyboard and shot list, coordinated with a camera crew, and produced and captured this exciting experiential event.

media.altText: Event coordinators working on attaching boxes of Bahlsen leibniz to a drone
Drone hovering over a Montclair, NJ street preparing to drop a box of Bahlsen leibniz
Camera crew filming drone event
Man grabbing a box of Bahlsen leibniz from a drone
Man happily grabbing a box of Bahlsen leibniz from a drone

projectKeypoints.title: Supplemental Marketing Strategy
projectKeypoints.description: We developed cohesive marketing tactics to target and retarget potential and repeat shoppers. This included printed advertisements, animated and interactive web banners, video teasers, and interactive shopping experiences.

media.altText: Interactive HTML banner ad showing Bahlsen shop with drone delivery theme
Landing page for a coupon to purchase Bahlsen leibniz
Animated intro banner showcasing Bahlsen drone delivery marketing concept
Retargeting ad for the Bahlsen drone campaign
Coupon

projectKeypoints.title: Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We filmed all preparation before and during the event, delivered numerous video edits and behind-the-scenes bits, and ran them on both paid and organic social media channels to continue generating buzz after the event.

media.altText: Social media video content showing Bahlsen drone campaign behind the scenes and reactions
Drones descending on the streets of Montclair, NJ
Bahlsen new branding teaser
Van full of Bahlsen leibniz boxes
Bahlsen branding transition teaser

author: Mike Angelo
title: Mercedes-Benz Marketing
coverAlt: Mercedes-Benz luxury car dealership showroom with premium vehicles and modern architecture
clientLogoAlt: Benzel-Busch Mercedes-Benz dealership logo with clover emblem
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch is the premier Mercedes-Benz and Genesis dealer in North Jersey. Known for their exceptional customer service and unique marketing incentives, they naturally needed automotive advertising that stood out from the noise.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Parts
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Mercedes-Benz parts and service commercial highlighting genuine components and expert technicians
mainKeypointMedia.description: Automotive service promotional video showcasing authentic Mercedes-Benz parts and professional maintenance

mainKeypointDescription: We delivered numerous award-winning campaigns, commercials, and marketing materials that leveraged Benzel-Busch's outstanding service and unique sales experience, continuing to drive traffic both online and in-store.

projectKeypoints.title: Innovative & Unique Ad Campaigns
projectKeypoints.description: We worked tirelessly to develop new and interesting campaigns that stood out from a sea of APR rates and lease terms. We leveraged Benzel-Busch's unique customer service incentives to get consumers to convert and stay loyal to the brand.

media.altText: Innovative garage door advertising campaign featuring Mercedes-Benz vehicles and creative messaging
Mercedes-Benz G-Wagon featured in luxury automotive advertising campaign

projectKeypoints.title: Monthly Marketing Materials
projectKeypoints.description: Every month we produced marketing materials for new vehicle specials and incentives including organic and paid social media, newsletters, rich media, and print advertising.

media.altText: Mercedes-Benz digital advertising banners showcasing monthly specials and luxury vehicles

projectKeypoints.title: Website Management & Maintenance
projectKeypoints.description: COVID created a surge in online car purchasing, so we had to adjust Benzel-Busch's website to match. We worked with a development team to build a brand new Wordpress site that delivers unmatched value to consumers looking to buy a new vehicle.

media.altText: Benzel-Busch responsive website demo showing inventory search and vehicle details
Mobile website demonstration featuring financing calculator and appointment scheduling

projectVideos.title: F1 Monaco Watch Party
projectVideos.altText: Formula 1 Monaco Grand Prix watch party event at Benzel-Busch Mercedes dealership
projectVideos.description: Luxury automotive customer appreciation event featuring F1 racing entertainment

projectVideos.title: Sales
projectVideos.altText: Mercedes-Benz sales promotional video showcasing luxury vehicles and customer service
projectVideos.description: Automotive sales campaign highlighting the premium car buying experience

projectVideos.title: Valet
projectVideos.altText: Premium valet service video demonstrating white-glove car treatment at Mercedes dealership
projectVideos.description: Luxury vehicle service and customer care promotional content

projectVideos.title: Service
projectVideos.altText: Mercedes-Benz service center video featuring certified technicians and state-of-the-art facilities
projectVideos.description: Professional automotive maintenance and repair services promotional video

author: Mike Angelo
title: Your Home, Your Gym
coverAlt: Modern home gym setup with premium fitness equipment including treadmill and weight machines
clientLogoAlt: Gym Source fitness equipment company logo
projectObjective: There was a huge disturbance in the fitness equipment market after COVID. As a result, Gym Source was looking to pivot their brand from individual equipment sales to fully developed custom gyms.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Not A Gym
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Gym Source commercial showcasing custom home gym installations and premium fitness equipment
mainKeypointMedia.description: Brand video featuring personalized home gym solutions and high-end fitness equipment

mainKeypointDescription: We explored and adjusted Gym Source's branding and messaging, designed and delivered a new website, rich media, commercials, and full-scope advertising campaigns, and reintroduced Gym Source into a new business-to-business market.

projectKeypoints.title: Renewed Website & Brand
projectKeypoints.description: We designed a new website and worked with a development team to build a custom Wordpress site that could handle commercial gym consultations and wholesale equipment information.

media.altText: Gym Source branding concept showing vitamin-inspired design and wellness focus
Gym Source website homepage demonstrating commercial gym consultation features
Website showcase of wholesale fitness equipment catalog and B2B services

projectKeypoints.title: Hard-hitting Ad Campaigns
projectKeypoints.description: We worked with a production team to develop numerous commercial spots that resonated with consumers and brought Gym Source back into the fitness scene.

media.altText: Gym Source digital advertising banners promoting home gym equipment and fitness solutions

projectKeypoints.title: Influencer & Television Partnerships
projectKeypoints.description: We partnered with NFL player George Kittle to promote his own Gym Source gym on social media. We also made an appearance on NBC's 'George to the Rescue' and sponsored a custom built unique gym for the show.

media.altText: NFL player George Kittle promoting custom home gym built by Gym Source
Your Home Your Gym Contest winner reveal on NBC George to the Rescue show

projectVideos.title: Your Home, Your Gym
projectVideos.altText: Gym Source commercial promoting custom home gym design and fitness equipment installation
projectVideos.description: Fitness equipment commercial featuring personalized home gym solutions

projectVideos.title: Dumbbell Ecstasy
projectVideos.altText: Energetic fitness commercial featuring weightlifting and strength training equipment
projectVideos.description: High-intensity workout promotional video with Gym Source equipment

projectVideos.title: Jacked Santa
projectVideos.altText: Holiday fitness commercial featuring Santa Claus workout with Gym Source equipment
projectVideos.description: Christmas themed fitness equipment promotional video

projectVideos.title: Make A Plan
projectVideos.altText: Fitness planning commercial demonstrating home gym design consultation process
projectVideos.description: Gym consultation and fitness planning promotional content

author: Mike Angelo
title: Fuel Your Fitness Fire
coverAlt: Blauner Fitness promotional campaign featuring at-home personal training services
projectObjective: Blauner Fitness was looking for both a revitalized website and bold advertising campaign to launch a new at-home fitness service.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Main
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Blauner Fitness campaign video highlighting at-home personal training services
mainKeypointMedia.description: Primary campaign video introducing Blauner Fitnessâ€™ new at-home and GLP-1 focused training services

mainKeypointDescription: I worked with the founder to develop campaign strategies, fresh branding materials, and a new website to revitalize the brand and bring attention to the new services.

projectKeypoints.title: Refreshed Campaign Strategies
projectKeypoints.description: I worked with the owner to develop new marketing strategies for different services he was ready to offer such as in-home personal training and a special GLP-1 fitness program.

media.altText: Blauner Fitness campaign strategy visual reference
Blauner Fitness campaign strategy visual reference

projectKeypoints.title: Website and Landing Designs
projectKeypoints.description: I used new photography and brand assets to revitalize Blauner Fitness' out-of-date website with a fresh new look, breakout pages, an FAQ section, and a consultation form.

media.altText: Blauner Fitness website redesign preview

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Marketing Materials
projectKeypoints.description: We ran social media campaigns over the course of 6 months promoting the new services and supported them with direct-to-consumer mailer campaigns.

media.altText: Blauner Fitness campaign strategy visual reference
Blauner Fitness campaign strategy visual reference

author: Mike Angelo
title: Seasonal Road Trip Series
coverAlt: Seasonal Mercedes-Benz road trip campaign featuring travel destinations and vehicles
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch was looking for an immersive ad campaign that connected the brand to customers on a personal level while highlighting the features of specific Mercedes-Benz models.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Seasonal Road Trips
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Mercedes-Benz seasonal road trip campaign overview video
mainKeypointMedia.description: Campaign video highlighting seasonal travel destinations paired with Mercedes-Benz vehicles

mainKeypointDescription: We developed a seasonal road trip campaign that paired popular travel destinations with specific Mercedes-Benz models, highlighting vehicle features that made each trip more enjoyable.

projectKeypoints.title: Planning the Road Trips
projectKeypoints.description: We researched and developed seasonal vacation PDFs featuring destinations, local attractions, accommodations, and hidden local gems.

media.altText: Seasonal road trip planning and destination guide visuals
Seasonal road trip planning and destination guide visuals

projectKeypoints.title: Integrated Sales Campaign
projectKeypoints.description: We paired destinations with specific Mercedes-Benz models, highlighting features like AWD and 3-row seating.

media.altText: Mercedes-Benz vehicle feature highlights for road trips
Mercedes-Benz vehicle feature highlights for road trips

projectKeypoints.title: Supplementary Social Media Content
projectKeypoints.description: We encouraged customers to share their road trip experiences, generating ongoing buzz for the campaign.

media.altText: User-generated social media content from Mercedes-Benz road trips
User-generated social media content from Mercedes-Benz road trips

author: Mike Angelo
title: Hide Them at Home
coverAlt: Bahlsen snack advertising campaign themed around at-home lockdown humor
projectObjective: Advertising was at a stand-still due to COVID, so Bahlsen asked us to quickly come up with a campaign that would capitalize on the silence.

mainKeypointMedia.title: Hide Them at Home
mainKeypointMedia.description: Playful campaign highlighting the struggle of sharing snacks during lockdown

mainKeypointDescription: We created a fun, relatable campaign about hiding your favorite snacks during COVID lockdowns.

projectKeypoints.title: Developing the Campaign
projectKeypoints.description: We developed humorous scenarios inspired by shared lockdown experiences.

media.altText: Bahlsen Hide Them at Home campaign concept imagery

projectKeypoints.title: Concept Development
projectKeypoints.description: We developed humorous scenarios inspired by shared lockdown experiences.

media.altText: Bahlsen Hide Them at Home campaign concept imagery

projectKeypoints.title: Concept Development
projectKeypoints.description: We developed humorous scenarios inspired by shared lockdown experiences.

media.altText: Bahlsen Hide Them at Home campaign concept imagery

author: Mike Angelo
title: EV Incentives & Protection Plan
coverAlt: Benzel-Busch electric vehicle incentive and protection plan advertising campaign
projectObjective: Benzel-Busch developed an electric vehicle upgrade and protection plan program and asked us to create campaigns to build awareness.

mainKeypointMedia.title: EV Incentives & Protection
mainKeypointMedia.altText: Benzel-Busch electric vehicle incentive campaign video
mainKeypointMedia.description: Mini-campaigns addressing EV myths and vehicle protection scenarios

mainKeypointDescription: Two mini-campaigns tackled EV misconceptions and highlighted real-world protection plan use cases.

projectKeypoints.title: EV Myth Busting
projectKeypoints.description: We interviewed actors exaggerating common EV myths to show how easy switching can be.

media.altText: Electric vehicle myth-busting campaign visuals

projectKeypoints.title: Protection Plan Scenarios
projectKeypoints.description: We created lighthearted scenarios demonstrating the value of vehicle protection plans.

media.altText: Vehicle protection plan campaign scenarios
